Class DefaultRotationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.rotations.DefaultRotationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RotationManager

    public final class DefaultRotationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements RotationManager
    The default rotation manager to handle all rotations

    DonkeyCore
